## GameClient.changeCustomPlayerProfile() method

修改自己的玩家自定义属性,如果当前在房间中会同时会触发通知(房间中所有玩家)

**Signature:**

```typescript
changeCustomPlayerProfile(customPlayerProfile: string, robotPlayerId?: string): Promise<IResult<null>>;
```
